title: Portugal - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Portugal stands at BBB+ with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Portugal was last set at Baa2 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Portugal was last reported at BBB+ with stable outlook. DBRS's credit rating for Portugal is A (low) with stable outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Portugal thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Portugal as reported by major credit rating agencies.
